article_title: IDF names third hostage killed by mistake.
sentence: IDF  names  third  hostage  killed  by  mistake.

article_title: IDF names third hostage killed by mistake.
sentence: The  Israeli  military  has  now  released  the  name  of  the  third  and  final  hostage  it's  admitted  to  accidentally  killing,  after  misidentifying  the  group  as  a  "threat".

article_title: IDF names third hostage killed by mistake.
sentence: Alon  Shamriz  was  abducted  from  Kibbutz  Kfar  Aza  on  7  October,  officials  say,  the  day  Hamas  crossed  the  border  into  Israel  and  killed  1,200  people.

article_title: IDF names third hostage killed by mistake.
sentence: In  a  brief  update,  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  says  Shamriz's  family  have  given  permission  for  his  name  to  be  published  alongside  that  of  Yotam  Haim  and  Samer  Talalka  -  the  other  two  hostages  killed.
